DialogueDictionary.NEW_HORIZONS_WARP_DRIVE_DIALOGUE_1: Your ship is now equipped with a warp drive!
DialogueDictionary.NEW_HORIZONS_WARP_DRIVE_DIALOGUE_2: You can use the new "Interstellar Mode" page in the ship log to lock-on your autopilot to another star system.
DialogueDictionary.NEW_HORIZONS_WARP_DRIVE_DIALOGUE_3: Then just buckle up and engage the autopilot to warp there!

UIDictionary.INSTALL_OUTER_WILDS_CHINESE_FONT_FIX: What why is this message being shown when the language is not set to Chinese go report this bug!
UIDictionary.OUTDATED_VERSION_WARNING:
WARNING

New Horizons only works on version {0} or higher. You're on version {1}.

Please update your game or uninstall NH.
UIDictionary.DLC_REQUIRED:
WARNING

You have addons (like {0}) installed which require the DLC but it is not enabled.

Your mods may not function as intended.

NH_EATEN_OUTSIDE_BRAMBLE.Name: Containment Breach
NH_EATEN_OUTSIDE_BRAMBLE.Description: Get eaten outside of Dark Bramble

NH_MULTIPLE_SYSTEM.Name: Traveller
NH_MULTIPLE_SYSTEM.Description: Visit 5 unique star systems in a row.

NH_VESSEL_WARP.Name: Lore Accurate
NH_VESSEL_WARP.Description: Warp to a star system using the Vessel.

NH_SUCKED_INTO_LAVA_BY_TORNADO.Name: Dieclone
NH_SUCKED_INTO_LAVA_BY_TORNADO.Description: Get sucked into lava by a tornado.
